quote:
5 Stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Original, delightful, and humorous, The Shop Before Life is a breath of fresh air... a unique story that is captivating, enjoyable, quirky, and fun.

B.R.A.G. Medallion Honoree

Delightful and magical, this book was so fresh and unique. I appreciated the wit and thoughtfulness of this story, and I'm already missing the characters. I look forward to more books by this author!
